RetryBackoffRandomRange.$comment: maximum value for the random part of the websocket reconnect back-off time

RetryBackoffRepeatTimes.$comment: amount of times previous reconnect back-off time will be doubled

RetryBackoffWaitMinimum.$comment: minimum back-off time of the first reconnect

AuthorizeConnectorZeroOnConnectorOne.$comment: Automatically authorize id tags on connector 1 when there is only one connector

LogMessages.$comment: Automatically log all sent and received messages to a temporary file at /tmp/libocpp_messages_<LIBOCPP_START_TIMESTAMP>.txt

LogMessagesFormat.$comment: Supported log formats are console, log, html, console_detailed and session_logging

SupportedChargingProfilePurposeTypes.$comment: Indicates which ChargingProfilePurposeTypes are supported. SetChargingProfile.req for profiles not listed will be rejected.

MaxCompositeScheduleDuration.$comment: Maximum duration in seconds of GetCompositeSchedule.req. For GetCompositeSchedule.req with a greater duration the schedule for only the MaxCompositeScheduleDuration will be calculated

WebsocketPingPayload.$comment: The payload sent in a websocket ping.

WebsocketPongTimeout.$comment: Maximum timeout for receiving a pong message in seconds

UseSslDefaultVerifyPaths.$comment: Use default verify paths for validating CSMS server certificate

OcspRequestInterval.$comment: Interval in seconds used to request OCSP revocation status information on the CSO Sub-CA certificates

SeccLeafSubjectCommonName.$comment: Common Name(s) of the SECC (EVSE) leaf certificate(s). The CN must be a SECCID. The field can contain optional multiple SECCIDs if necessary.

SeccLeafSubjectCountry.$comment: County of the SECC (EVSE) leaf certificate. Indicates in which country the CPO operates.

SeccLeafSubjectOrganization.$comment: Organization of the SECC (EVSE) leaf certificate. Indicates which CPO operates this EVSE. Example: Hubject GmbH

ConnectorEvseIds.$comment: Comma separated EVSEIDs for OCPP connectors starting with connector 1 in one string.

AllowChargingProfileWithoutStartSchedule.$comment: OCPP1.6 specifies that for certain ChargingProfiles the startSchedule field needs to be set. This flag ignores this requirement and will accept those profiles without startSchedule, assuming startSchedule is now.

WaitForStopTransactionsOnResetTimeout.$comment: Specifies the timeout that is used when transactions are stopped because of a Reset.req . If timeout exceeds, the reset callback is executed even if StopTransaction.conf messages not yet received for transactions that have been active.
